ygData.subject: Re: queynos and gate
ygData.msgSnippet: Yup! do the Drosco quest, the guy in our guild gives you the gate spell, or just do like I did, have a bud buy it for ya [cheap way to get around it] ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Yup! do the Drosco quest, the guy in our guild gives you the gate spell, or
just do like I did, have a bud buy it for ya [cheap way to get around it]
-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Kean <jk211495@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 11:23 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] queynos and gate


>From: "Jason Kean" <jk211495@...>
>
>I'm a necro in queynos, and none of the lovelies in my guild or the other
>guilds in my temple sell that gate spell. I like the gate spell, it's a
>pretty darn usefull piece of work, and the happy mages and enchanters and
>wizards in the surface guild...well..they don't like necros that much, and
>of course won't sell to me. Anyone have any ideas where to get the spell?
>I know doing the drosco quest can get you a random spell somtimes, but
after
>6 tries of it, I still have yet to get the gate spell. Anyhow, any imput
>would be appreciated.
>
> Cyrissa, Level 7 Necro, Veeshan
>
>
